hero.title: Boost your business with web solutions orbiting innovation and security.
hero.subtitle: Your business deserves a stellar online presence. We'll help you reach for the stars.
hero.motivational: The universe of digital possibilities awaits your brand
hero.headline: Boost your <0>digital presence</0>, without working harder

services.title: What do you gain with us?
services.subtitle: Digital Solutions for your business
services.description: We offer core services that cover all your business digital needs. Click on the cards to see more details.
services.sliderInstruction: Move sideways to explore each panel
services.contactPrompt: Looking for something else? Contact us.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: We're a team of passionate digital creators dedicated to launching your business into the digital stratosphere.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to help businesses of all sizes achieve orbital success with cutting-edge web solutions and service integrations.
about.quote: Your vision, our mission - reaching for the stars together.

benefits.title: What advantages do you get with us?

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Record-time deliveries without compromising quality. Agile methodologies for immediate results.

economic.title: Economical
economic.description: Fair prices for businesses of all sizes. No hidden costs or surprises.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: We implement best security practices. Data protection and regulatory compliance.

scalable.title: Scalable
scalable.description: Solutions that grow with your business. Flexible architecture for the future.

stat1.text: of companies lose over $2,500/month due to downtime

stat2.text: increase sales thanks to web performance

process.title: How does our process work?
process.step1Detail: We get to know your business, objectives, and requirements. Together we define the scope and roadmap of the project.
process.step2Detail: We analyze the market, the competition, and your target audience to develop a comprehensive strategy.
process.step3Detail: We create functional prototypes and develop the solution with constant communication and iterations.
process.step4Detail: We perform exhaustive testing and make the necessary adjustments before going live.
process.step5Detail: We provide ongoing support, updates, and optimizations to ensure the solution continues to deliver results.

contact.title: Ready to Start?
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your project and let us create something amazing together.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.serviceLabel: Which services are you looking for?
contact.messageRequired: Please tell us about your project
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.
contact.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
contact.schedulePrompt: Choose your preferred time slot and let's launch your project today.

cta.title: Ready to take the next step?
cta.subtitle: Boost your agency today
cta.description: Contact us today to start working on your project. Our team is ready to help you reach your goals.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.detail: We create modern, fast, and responsive websites, tailored to the needs of your business, optimized for SEO, and with best accessibility practices.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.detail: We design attractive, intuitive, and user-centered interfaces, ensuring a consistent and professional visual experience.

serviceTitan.title: ServiceTitan Integration
serviceTitan.detail: We integrate your business with ServiceTitan to automate processes, improve management, and connect your systems efficiently.

analytics.title: Business Analytics and Inventory Prediction
analytics.detail: We implement advanced analytics and inventory prediction systems using AI, so you can make informed decisions and optimize your resources.

emailMarketing.title: Email marketing
emailMarketing.detail: We create automated email marketing campaigns that build loyalty and boost conversions, integrated with your sales tools.

meta.title: Weavion
meta.description: Weavion - Web development and digital experience design

web.title: Web Design & Development
web.desc: Ultra-fast, accessible sites. Micro-interactions, SEO and 90+ Lighthouse performance.

servicetitan.title: ServiceTitan Integration
servicetitan.desc: From lead to revenue without friction: clean capture, automatic assignment and full operational control.

automation.title: Automation

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.desc: Real-time data to decide with confidence.

servicetitan.title: ServiceTitan Integration
servicetitan.desc: From lead to revenue with full control.

automation.title: Automations
automation.desc: Workflows that run for you all day.

hero.title: Websites that turn visits into sales
hero.subtitle: Real performance, <TermHint>Search engine optimization: structure, content and speed that boost ranking and organic traffic.</TermHint> plus action-focused UX. Your brand looks premium and every screen pushes users to “buy”, “book” or “request a quote”.

sales.title: Closed sales per month
sales.description: Speed and clarity reduce friction. More users complete the purchase flow.
sales.note: Sustained trend after optimizing load times and visual hierarchy.

deliver.title: What we deliver
items: SEO architecture + content that ranks and sells.
Conversion metrics to iterate each month.

hero.title: ServiceTitan integrated: frictionless operation
hero.subtitle: Schedule, assign, invoice and report from a single flow. Fewer errors, more productive time.

funnel.title: End-to-end controlled pipeline
funnel.description: Each lead moves forward with clear rules. Automatic assignment, reminders and unified documentation to meet <TermHint>committed times</TermHint> and reduce no-shows.
funnel.note: Stage visibility: fewer leaks, more closes.

activate.title: What we activate
items: Routes and automatic assignment by area and workload.
Templates and charges ready for the field.
Performance reports by technician and crew.

hero.title: Analytics that guide investment and growth
hero.subtitle: Real-time dashboards: <CAC>Customer Acquisition Cost: total spend / new customers.</CAC>, <ROAS>Return on ad spend: attributable revenue / ad spend.</ROAS>, close rate and revenue per channel. Data-driven decisions, not gut feelings.

kpis.label: CAC
kpis.desc: Customer acquisition cost controlled month by month.

kpis.label: ROAS
kpis.desc: Higher return for every dollar invested.

combo.title: ROI vs CAC (last 6 months)
combo.description: We reallocate budget to the channels with better <ROAS>return on ad spend</ROAS> and pause those that drain investment.
combo.note: ROI rises while CAC is contained: more profitability per campaign.

get.title: What you get
items: Executive dashboards by channel, campaign and team.
Deviation alerts to react in time.
Automatic reports to your email every week.

hero.title: Schedule more, with less friction.
hero.subtitle: Synced calendar, confirmations via WhatsApp/SMS, smart reminders and rescheduling in one tap.

features.title: Dynamic slots
features.desc: Real availability per technician, area and SLA.

features.title: Lead-to-appointment funnel
features.desc: From qualified lead → scheduled in one flow.
